title: Crypto Analyst Predicts Bitcoin Could Surpass $330,000, Breaking Historical Growth Patterns
description: In an analysis posted on Tradingview, cryptocurrency analyst Tradingshot presents a view where bitcoin might cross the $330,000 threshold. Utilizing a blend of historical pattern disruptions and the Theory of Diminishing Returns (TODR), the market analyst posits that the upcoming cycle may break from the traditional pattern of lesser yields. title: NFT market experiences a significant rise in sales in a week
description: Sales of non-fungible tokens experienced a significant uptick over the past week, with transactions totaling $442.02 million, marking an 11.62% increase compared to the previous seven days. Leading the surge were Bitcoin-based NFTs, which claimed the top spot in sales volume across 22 different blockchains. NFT market sales hit 11.62% in a week The standout […]
